meanings.definition: To make a new master copy of (a recording) with the use of digital technology.
meanings.sent1: The old song was remastered to sound better on modern devices.
meanings.sent2: The album was remastered to improve its audio quality.
meanings.sent3: The band remastered their hit song, but accidentally added funny sound effects.
meanings.sent4: She remastered her presentation, turning it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The remastered version of the movie was like watching it for the first time.

meanings.definition: A new version of a previously recorded piece of music or film.
meanings.sent1: I bought the remastered edition of my favorite album.
meanings.sent2: The remastered film had enhanced visual effects compared to the original.
meanings.sent3: The remastered song became an instant classic among fans.
meanings.sent4: The remastered version of the movie was a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: Listening to the remastered track felt like rediscovering an old treasure.
